InitMessage: There are {size} participant slots ready for sign-ups.
MainMenu:
Participant Menu
====================
1. Sign Up
2. Cancel Sign Up
3. View Participants
4. Save Changes
5. Exit
SignupSlotError: Error: Slot #{EntrantSlot} is filled. Please try again.
SignupSuccess: Success: {EntrantName} is signed up in starting slot #{EntrantSlot}.
CancelError: Error: {EntrantName} is not in that starting slot.
CancelSuccess: Success: {EntrantName} has been cancelled from starting slot #{EntrantSlot}.
ExitPrompt:
Any unsaved changes will be lost.
Are you sure you want to exit? [y/n]
